languages.text: "Ах! Нижайше прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость! Ни в коем разе не хотел оскорбить вас!" {n}Атилиус низко кланяется, дрожа всем телом.{/n}
"Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ах! Нижайше прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость! Ни в коем разе не хотел оскорбить вас!" {n}Атилиус низко кланяется, дрожа всем телом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}

"Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}

languages.text: “啊！请允许我致以最深的歉意，大人！我刚刚不是有意冒犯您！”{n}阿蒂利乌斯低头鞠躬，从头到脚都在颤抖。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “啊！请允许我致以最深的歉意，大人！我刚刚不是有意冒犯您！”{n}阿蒂利乌斯低头鞠躬，从头到脚都在颤抖。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Ah! ¡Mis más sinceras disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡No pretendía ofenderl{mf|e|a}!». {n}Atilius hace una profunda reverencia, temblando de pies a cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah! ¡Mis más sinceras disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡No pretendía ofenderl{mf|e|a}!». {n}Atilius hace una profunda reverencia, temblando de pies a cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: 「ああ！誠心誠意お詫び申し上げます、陛下！」{n}アティリウスは頭からつま先まで震わせながら、深々とお辞儀する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ！誠心誠意お詫び申し上げます、陛下！」{n}アティリウスは頭からつま先まで震わせながら、深々とお辞儀する。{/n}

languages.text: "Ah! Ich bitte vielmals um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich wollte Euch nicht brüskieren!" {n}Atilius verbeugt sich tief und zittert von Kopf bis Fuß.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah! Ich bitte vielmals um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich wollte Euch nicht brüskieren!" {n}Atilius verbeugt sich tief und zittert von Kopf bis Fuß.{/n}

languages.text: « Ah ! Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne voulais pas vous offenser ! » {n}Atilius se prosterne en tremblant de tout son corps.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ah ! Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne voulais pas vous offenser ! » {n}Atilius se prosterne en tremblant de tout son corps.{/n}

languages.text: "Ah! Canıgönülden özürlerimi kabul edin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Niyetim sizi gücendirmek değildi!" {n}Atilius, önünde tir tir titreyerek eğiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah! My deepest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I did not mean to offend you!" {n}Atilius bows low, trembling from head to toe.{/n}
